env HOME=$WORK/home

benchinit -benchtime=123x -benchmem -memprofile=mem.out -cpuprofile cpu.out .
stdout '^BenchmarkInit'
stdout '\s123\s'
stdout '0 B/op\s*0 allocs/op' # empty init
! stderr .
exists mem.out # -memprofile=mem.out
exists cpu.out # -cpuprofile cpu.out

-- go.mod --
module test.tld/foo
-- empty.go --
package foo

func init() {}
